attributes.action: Ask his friends in Israel and Egypt to cement the tunnels that connect the Gaza Strip. It would allow Israel to concentrate on other less spectacular show of force.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be cheaper for Israel to do this. I assume our Egyptian partners know where these tunnels cross their border. If not, I urge the Priminister to request that our truest friends, the Israelis, to tell their Egyptian partners where the entrances are. If his diplomacy can achieve this, would we not be sleeping more snuggly tonight?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
